body.p:
Head-Quarters Army Dept. of the Ohio,
Knoxville, East Tennessee, Decr. 22d 1863
SPECIAL FIELD ORDERS,
No. 114

5,, ,, ,, ,, The resignation of Capt. Wm Perkins Co "C" 1st Ky Cavy, tendered on account of physical disability, is hereby accepted to take effect Decr. 25h 1863. any balance of pay due him at that time, will be suspended, until satisfatory evidence is furnished to the Paymaster, that he is not indebted to the U. S. Govt.
By Order of Major General Burnside Foster.

J T Anderson
Assistant Adjutant General.
Major & A. D. C.

1 Cavy
Capt. Perkins
Resig:
Filed Jany 7. 1864
